Record numbers: Argentina : 4 , Bolivia : 2 , Brazil : 2 , Chile : 3 , Colombia : 4 , Uruguay : 1 ;
total: 16 .

Remarks:
Macrobiotus echinogenitus
is cosmopolitan (
McInnes 1994 a
), probably representing a species group, suggesting this South American record requires confirmation.
